entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is a disgraced elf who is being freed. She is upset and ashamed of her situation.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is trying to comfort Winky and is defending her against Mr. Crouch's treatment.

entities.name: mr crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is the one who has wronged Winky in the past and should be ashamed of his behavior.

relationships.description: Winky was mistreated by Mr. Crouch, which is why she is upset and ashamed.
Hermione is trying to comfort Winky and defend her against Mr. Crouch's treatment.
